landan marathan tharagaye 14wani sthanayata pathwu shri lanka kridaka anuradha indrajith kureta labana agosthuwe moskaw hi pawathwena loka malala krida shurathawaliyata sahabhagiwime awasthawa ahimiwi giyeya.loka malala krida shurathawaliyata awashya parisadhana mattamawu paya 2, winadi 17ka kalaya landan marathan tharagaye di anuradha indrajithta thathpara 53kin ahimiwi yama meyata hethuwi thibe.landan marathan tharagayedi anuradha indrajith kure paya 2:17:53ka kalayak gena 14wani sthanayata pathweddi ohuta kalin tharagaya nima kala tharagakaruwan dahathundenama loka malala krida shurathawaliyata awashya parisadhana mattama wartha kara thibima da wisheshathwayaki.anuradhata kalin tharagaya nima kala tharagaye 13waniya wu brithanyaye derak hawkins paya 2:16:50ka kalayak gena landan marathan tharagayen loka malala krida shurathawaliyata sudusukam labu awasan kridakaya bawata pathwiya.anuradha indrajithta kalin landan marathan tharagaya nima kala siyaluma tharagakaruwan yuropiya ha aprikanu ratawala kridakayan wuha.anuradhata pasuwa kenya, ithiyopiya ha brithanya kridakayan siti athara japanaye yukiki akaba paya 2:24:43ka kalayakin 18wani sthanayata pathwiya.loka malala krida shurathawaliyata sudusukam laba ganime awasthawa me wasare juli 31wanidayin awasan wana athara eyata pera anuradha indrajith jathyanthara tharagayakadi awashya parisadhana mattama pasu kala yuthuya.danata landan hi padinchiwa sitina anuradha indrajith kure 2004di pakisthanaye pawathi aasiya krida ulele ran padakkama dinagath athara olimpik krida ulela dekakadima shri lankawa niyojanaya kirime awasthawa udakara gaththeya.pasugiya wasare di landan marathan tharagayedi 23wani sthanayata pathwu ohu mewara eyata wada winadi 4kin pragathiyak laba thibuni..
